official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Geary County Fire Department certain land in the State of Kansas.
short_title: Geary County, Kansas, Land Conveyance Act

summary.text: Geary County, Kansas, Land Conveyance Act - Directs the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Geary County Fire Department certain land under the jurisdiction of the Secretary in Geary County, Kansas.

titles.title: Geary County, Kansas, Land Conveyance Act
To direct the Secretary of the Army to convey to the Geary County Fire Department certain land in the State of Kansas.
